quote: And you've got to put your bodies upon the gears and upon the wheels, upon the levers, upon all the apparatus, and you've got to make it stop! ... unless you're free the machine will be prevented from working at all
quote_letters: AND YOUVE GOT TO PUT YOUR BODIES UPON THE GEARS AND UPON THE WHEELS UPON THE LEVERS UPON ALL THE APPARATUS AND YOUVE GOT TO MAKE IT STOP  UNLESS YOURE FREE THE MACHINE WILL BE PREVENTED FROM WORKING AT ALL
